overview: 1) Intro (Resurrection) [00:05]  2) Bye Bye Beautiful [03:25]  3) Dark Chest of Wonders [07:40]  4) Whoever Brings the Night [13:10]  5) The Siren [18:00]  6) Amaranth [22:50]  7) Sacrament of Wilderness [27:15]  8) The Poet And the Pendulum [32:30]  9) Ever Dream [46:35]  10) While Your Lips Are Still Red [52:50]  11) Wishmaster [57:15]  12) Sahara [62:15]  13) Nemo [68:35]  14) Wish I Had an Angel [75:45]
title: Nightwish: Live at Wacken 2008
